movies.title: Troublesome Night
movies.plot: This Chinese ghost film centers on the theme of the haunted streets in Hong Kong, where four loosely connected stories are depicted. A group of young friends go on a camping trip in the countryside, where Ken encounters a mysterious woman near a grave. Afterward, Ken's life is changed forever as he becomes a victim of ghost meddling. As the friends journey back to Hong Kong without Ken, another sinister story takes place. Mrs. To has a date with her husband to celebrate their wedding anniversary, but becomes concern when he doesn't show up. The outcome of this second story leads to Ken's friend Jojo being courted by a ghost, and ultimately leads to the final story where Peter Butt unknowingly visits a haunted theater with some of Ken's friends.
movies.simplePlot: This Chinese ghost film centers on the theme of the haunted streets in Hong Kong, where four loosely connected stories are depicted. A group of young friends go on a camping trip in the ...

biography.bio: Simon Lui was born on July 8, 1964 in Hong Kong. He is an actor and writer, known for Ching ham baak lok moon (2000), Troublesome Night (1997) and Gui qing ni di hu (1999).
biography.name: Simon Lui

actors.character: Peter Butt / The Host / Mr. Big Mole

biography.bio: Louis Koo was born on October 21, 1970 in Hong Kong as Louis Tin Lok Koo. He is an actor and producer, known for Drug War (2012), Triad Election (2006) and Election (2005).
biography.name: Louis Koo

biography.bio: Allen Ting was born on May 6, 1974 in Hong Kong, British Crown Colony as Ting Chi-Chun. He is known for his work on Summer Snow (1995), Secrets de Xangai (2011) and Troublesome Night 3 (1998).
biography.name: Allen Ting

biography.bio: Jason Chu is an actor, known for Young and Dangerous 3 (1996), Young and Dangerous (1996) and Young and Dangerous 2 (1996).
biography.name: Jason Chu

biography.bio: Teresa Mak was born on August 1, 1975 in Hong Kong as Mak Ka-Kei. She is an actress, known for Sun zat see ze (2003), The Legendary 'Tai Fei' (1999) and Let's Go Slam Dunk (1994).
biography.name: Teresa Mak

biography.bio: Ada Choi was born on September 17, 1973 in Hong Kong. She is an actress, known for Fist of Legend (1994), Le roi singe 2 - Cendrillon (1995) and Empresses in the Palace (2011). She has been married to Jin Zhang since January 12, 2008. They have two children.
biography.name: Ada Choi

biography.bio: Kar Sin Pak is an actress, known for Wan 9 zhao 5 (1994), Troublesome Night (1997) and Expect the Unexpected (1998).
biography.name: Kar Sin Pak

biography.bio: Helena Law Lan had never married, and her actual name is "LO Yin Ying", but her stage name is "Law Lan", after the Cantonese pronunciation of Sophia Loren's last name. Her family used to be fairly well-off, because her father was a soap merchant who supplied to major hotels in Hong Kong, and the family employed a number of servants at home. However, they lost everything during World War II. Hence she lives simply, and believes that money should be spent wisely and effectively. Despite her age (73 in 2009), she spends a lot of time doing volunteer work, e.g. helping at old people's homes. She has a big sister, six nephews and nieces, and a number of grand-nephews and nieces. During festivals, she has gatherings at her sister's home.
biography.name: Lan Law

biography.bio: Lik-Chi Lee was born in May 1961 in Hong Kong. He is an actor and director, known for Bons baisers de Pékin (1994), Flirting Scholar (1993) and The God of Cookery (1996).
biography.name: Lik-Chi Lee

biography.bio: Sunny Chan was born on January 1, 1967 in Hong Kong. He is known for his work on Hold You Tight (1998), Di dui (2001) and Dong xing hao da jie an (1996). He has been married to Man-wai To since February 15, 2004. They have one child.
biography.name: Sunny Chan

biography.bio: Christy Chung was born on September 19, 1970 in Montréal, Québec, Canada. She is an actress, known for Samsara (2001), Le médaillon (2003) and The Defender (1994). She was previously married to Jon Yen and Glen Ross.
biography.name: Christy Chung

biography.bio: Kenix Kwok was born on November 27, 1970 in Hong Kong. She is an actress, known for Ten Brothers (2007), Zhen xiang (1995) and Pau mui (1998). She has been married to Frankie Lam since March 10, 2004. They have one child.
biography.name: Kenix Kwok

biography.bio: Siu-Kei Lee is an actor and producer, known for Full Alert (1997), Jiang Hu: The Triad Zone (2000) and The White Storm: Narcotic (2013).
biography.name: Siu-Kei Lee

biography.bio: King-Tan Yuen was born on September 11, 1962 in Hong Kong, British Crown Colony as Lai-King Yuen. She is an actress, known for Wing Chun (1994), Last Hero in China (1993) and Un couple explosif (1992).
biography.name: King-Tan Yuen

biography.bio: Frankie Chi-Hung Ng was born on December 25, 1953 in Hong Kong, British Crown Colony as Chi-Hung Ng. He is an actor and producer, known for Prison on Fire (1987), Hitman (1998) and Trivisa (2016).
biography.name: Frankie Chi-Hung Ng
